page.title: 05Games old and New
page.content: The local old peoples home was visite and grandparents interviewed to help discover traditional local childrens games and compare them with those played nowdays. Games played now seem to involve a ball and games teams of children. Most popular are soccer, tennis, snooker and rounders. These are played with the proper equipement, wheras the past there were more games involving items that did not need to be bought, such as ring on a stringg, kick the can, and jacks and bobbins played with pebbles. Other games played now are tig, kiss-dare, promise, skipping hopscotch, knock- a- door- run and hide and seek. Of the some are very old such as hide andseek. Old local games, now not played are crows nest, diabalo and whip and top
